description: This file defines a UI component for the Intro page of a quiz application using the LightningJS framework. It includes a centered title, subtitle, start and help buttons, and a help tooltip. The component manages layout, styling, and button interactions, including navigation to other routes.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component that renders the intro page with title, subtitle, buttons, and tooltip.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the component's reactive state including layout sizes, colors, text content, and tooltip visibility.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components used within this component, specifically the Button component.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Initializes button behaviors, setting up navigation actions and tooltip display logic upon component readiness.
